content:
Hey folks! We recently received a suggestion to improve the Authentication methods settings panel: #20987.

I think at a minimum, it would make sense to make it look like our other checkbox settings -- checkboxes on the left, no horizontal lines.

Thoughts on the cards/and or icons idea in the issue? I imagine this panel is not visited very frequently (one doesn't need to update these settings often), so I don't think it's worth investing a lot of time into.

I am extremely wary of investing too much time in this, unless it's a compelling usability improvement. Our audience here is admins, and as Alya pointed out, even admins probably rarely touch this.

Putting the checkboxes on the left seems extremely sensible.
There are certainly other setting panels where this level of design love would be a lot more leveraged.
OK, sounds good -- I filed #21001 as a replacement for #20987.
Alya Abbott has marked this topic as resolved.

https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/21002

Raised a PR solving this, can you please review and merge.
